title: Install Ping Indicator (please!)
body: How about in this new client we get to see our ping not just in-game, in a corner, whatever as long is its there. This could mean better games for all of us so we can know if we are lagging for some reason before the game. Yes i know you can do it through CMD but there are too many loops.

replies.body: Better idea. Riot please implement a code that checks peoples internet speed and warn them into playing a gam when they play a game. If their speed is awful which can cause them to DC from the game at the beginning or during ban them until their connection is better.

bro, you don't get how it works, the ping in the client wont show the ping in the game, so that's why they can't implement it, the ping in the game depends on the host for the game and connections and other players of the game and can be on a different server, the ping in the client would be inaccurate but if you just want to check your internet speed you can go to www.speedtest.net
